name: Shoot Beans V1.1
description:
Shoot Beans is a rage game designed to try to get you to rage. Shoot beans as you go through levels. Beat it beans!

Thanks for downloading if you did! This is only the newest of the new version so there is gonna be a new one in a little bit (2 weeks to a month if I'm fast enough). 

Patch notes for V1.1: There is now 20 levels, a boss fight, and new mechanics, + bug fixes!

Have fun!
